pma:database.name: blog
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `comments` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `author` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `comment_text` text NOT NULL, `comment_date` datetime NOT NULL, `article_id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=69 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
